comments.en:
If someone believes this printer works -clearly document how to get it to work HERE. It simply does not work since the protocol is proprietary and undisclosed.
From all accounts, this printer does not use the same protocol as the BJC-4x00 line or the BJC-600. No free driver is known to exist, and the protocol is not known to be documented.

Consumables/Refills: black/color, color/photo, or black/black cart pairs
